body.p: Accordingly, the Board concluded that an entity should recognise all income tax consequences of dividends applying the requirements in paragraph 57A. However, the Board also observed that, before those requirements were amended, the requirements in paragraph 57A could be misread to imply that paragraph 57A applied only in the circumstances described in paragraph 52A.
